title: Lovely Studio Apartment… Waiting for You to Make it Home!
posting_body: ['We are pet friendly', 'Solis Garden Apartments in Hayward, CA', 'Call Now:', '(510) 39-0356', 'OR Text', '4', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Solis Garden', '145 Lund Avenue, Hayward, CA, 94544', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath', 'Experience the Solis Life Style!', 'Solis is Hayward’s best-kept secret offering newly renovated studio,1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartments.', 'Our homes were designed with you in mind and are satiated with elegant interior finishes including in-home laundry*, gourmet kitchens equipped with top of line stainless steel appliances, high end gas stoves, modern cabinetry, stone countertops, wood-inspired flooring, brand new double pane windows, desirable open floor plans, distinctive energy efficient fixtures and many other meticulous finishing touches.', 'In addition to top of the line interiors, Solis also offers ample covered parking, convenient laundry facilities, oversized patios, and a sparkling pool.', 'With just a brief drive to downtown Hayward, shopping, CSU East Bay, and BART and a simple commute to San Jose, The Peninsula, and Oakland, Solis provides the optimal balance between luxury, affordability, and location.', 'We invite you to set up an appointment today with one of our welcoming and highly responsive management team members, committed to providing the lifestyle you deserve.', 'Please excuse our current exterior appearance.', 'We have exciting improvements in the making.', 'Be the first to reap the full benefits of our new look!', 'Solis Garden Leasing Office.', 'Please visit Solis Garden Leasing Office at W. 20 Harder Road Hayward, CA 94544', 'Features', '- 2" Wood Inspired Window Blinds', '- Bar Top Gathering*', '- Gas Stove', '- Newly Remodeled Apartment Homes', '- Ceiling Fan', '- Mirrored Wardrobe Doors', '- New Cabinetry', '- Stone Countertops', '- Modern Single Panel Doors', '- Washer and Dryer*', 'In Select Apartments', '- Wood-Inspired Flooring', '- Microwave*', '- Stainless Appliances', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '- Dishwasher*', '- Brushed Nickel Finishes', '*In Select Homes', 'Community Amenities', '- Near Shopping and Dining', '- Covered Parking', '- Great Location', '- Refreshing Pool', '- Clothes Care Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Yes we are pet friendly.', 'our pet policy is a 500.00 deposit and a 50.00 monthly fee', 'Income Requirements:', 'Gross income 2.0 times amount of rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'ptURPsk7']
